events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is completely different from what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster because the customer is asking for a refund for the incorrect product received.
Assigning the case to an agent specialized in refund processing to handle the customer's request promptly.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I'll be happy to assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item received so I can verify the issue and start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached the photo showing the incorrect product that was delivered to me instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information and photo. We will process your refund immediately and provide you with instructions to return the wrong item at no cost.
Thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue smoothly.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We just wanted to follow up to ensure that you have received your refund and if everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support, and have a great day!
